EmailTemplate.name: EMS_CAMConnection_2011_August
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing the New EMS CAM Connection August Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
August 2011 Edition
Welcome to our first edition of the TriTech Software Systems: CAM Connection for EMS Solutions. CAM stands for “Customer Account Manager” and in an effort to bring you more customized and timely information, we have developed this publication exclusively for the customers of our EMS Solutions group. To keep current customers up-to-date with the most relevant information, we will be sending you this monthly newsletter. While your respective sales rep has not changed, their title has. Your CAM will continue to manage your account and communicate with you via email, phone and through this CAM Connection newsletter. Feel free to let us know if you have suggestions on topics you would like to hear about.
Important Alerts & Updates (http://offers.tritech.com/EMS_CAMConnection_2011_August_AlertsUpdates)

Free Monthly EMS Solutions Tips 'n Sips If you’ve never signed up for our online dialog sessions with “Coffee with Kelly,” do it now and help maximize the use of your Sweet-Billing and Fusion ePCR products.

> Upcoming Sweet-Billing Software Group Trainings
> TriCON: Top 3 Reasons to Come to TriCON
We understand that many travel and training budgets have been slashed; which means that regardless of the merits of a conference, you’ll probably need to justify the expense. We’ve gathered the top three value/benefits for attending TriCON. Read More...
